response:
My dear wife,

I have assigned one of old or young to each of the words on your list. Here are my choices:

* Joy - Young
* Love - Old
* Peace - Young
* Wonderful - Young
* Pleasure - Young
* Glorious - Old
* Laughter - Young
* Happy - Young
* Agony - Old
* Terrible - Old
* Horrible - Old
* Nasty - Old
* Evil - Old
* Awful - Old
* Failure - Old
* Hurt - Old

I hope these assignments meet with your approval, my dear.

Yours always,
Your husband
